node.title: Updated Config.json to update Websocket
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Edit - New Post is live now

https://steemit.com/utopian-io/@codingdefined/3bmmnm-updated-config-json-to-update-websocket

Edit - 31/Oct/2017 - Discarding this post as per @elear comment

Hello @codingdefined. Announcements in Utopian are used to ask for changes not for releasing changes. For this you have to use the standard contribution. I cannot change this so i advise you to discard this post and create a contribution under development category. I will accept that once done.

[utopian-moderator]

node.title: Add Images with Underscore in Busy.org
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
When I upload Images in Steemit it creates a path which includes steemitimages.com and then the whole path. For Example : https://steemitimages.com/ + DQmaYauBqmx5z8GiwJTKPpinTQ6ebxetwhJKqakruLEwDQJ/IMG_20170302_105004917.jpg Now if you have an Image which has underscore ("_") in it, busy.org remove that underscore from the URL.So, when you try to copy the URL to busy.org, it looks something like below where the underscore is missing. ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1509423844/oq6uypcopegt9fooxpx9.png)
Open Source Contribution posted via Utopian.io

node.title: City View of Udaipur from the Udaipur City Palace
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Udaipur in India (State - Rajasthan) is one of the most romantic cities in the World because of its natural attractions and a large number of places to visit. Udaipur City Palace is one such palace which has a huge compound and a large palace which approximately takes around 2.5 hours if you want to see every corner of the Palace.

​But more than the Palace I liked the City View, from the Palace itself. Sharing some of the photos clicked.

​![IMG_20170302_ 105004917.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaYauBqmx5z8GiwJTKPpinTQ6ebxetwhJKqakruLEwDQJ/IMG\__20170302\__105004917.jpg)

​

![IMG_20170302_ 105017771_HDR.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQ4gyZRQLa7MRzCo7KYmJ4b2jY2jHNC7k3L4vLyZ4v6nR/IMG_\_20170302_105017771\__HDR.jpg)

​

node.title: Convert File Types using Zamzar
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Have you ever felt a need of converting one file type to another? If that is the case you might have searched google and end up having to sign up for the account.

[Zamzar]() can be your one stop solution for converting any file type to another and without having to sign up. 

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbxAKQ6iGgnSGZVws4V7uzvdwMTHGhPV5D9pmKQCPsfTv/image.png)

PC : Zamzar.com

​

Zamzar support more than 1600 types of file, that means if a file can be convertible they can convert for you. The process is simple, you just need to upload the file, select which file type you wanted it to be converted and enter your email address. Boom! your converted file will be sent to your email address.

Now if you want to convert bigger files lets say 1 GB then you need to sign up. But that's ok, for the free service you are getting so many file type to be converted.

<hr>

Follow @codingdefined

<hr>

node.title: Nature's Architecture or Mother's Love
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
The below image was taken in Coorg, Karnataka, India. I actually cannot figure out the caption of this image, it can be "Nature's Architecture" or "Mother's Love".

"Nature's Architecture" because of the beauty whereas "Mother's Love" because so many child plants are growing over it even though the tree "Mother" is almost dead.

![IMG_20170909_ 095601.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQZYA9XuByouHEgJ7birgqmm3Bz4emp864V6W4AD6YSVg/IMG\__20170909\__095601.jpg)

Camera : Nokia 6

What do you think, what should be the caption of this image and why?

<hr>

Follow @codingdefined

<hr>

node.body:

### View from the Lake Pichola in Udaipur, India

Udaipur in Rajasthan, India, has many historical places to visit and you can see them while having a boat ride in the Lake Pichola. The building which you are seeing was a fort earlier which was converted as a 5 star hotel.

node.title: Misplaced Manual of a Device - Get it in ManualsLib
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
There are situations in everyone's life that you would like to read a manual of a device after an year an half just to check that you are using the device correctly. In the big cities you can easily call up the customer care and they will come in a day or two to show you functionality of device again. But in the village side or a small cities, customer care is not that active where you actually need to read the manual.

Now what if you have misplaced your manual or the manual did not came with the device. In either of the situation ManualsLib will come into the rescue. It is a free repository or library where you will get millions of manuals across devices categories. 

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcoKVDLMrtdpBpqsKECtJwnTEV14LJWrkvhnaMJb9EGN5/image.png)

PC : ManualsLib.com

As you can see above it offers a simple search box where it shows matching results as soon as you start typing for any product. Now if you have found the product, you can get user manual and you can keep it for future purpose.

![](https://www.manualslib.com/images/about/statistic-wide.svg)

PC : ManualsLib.com

Now if you have any product use manual is lying around in your home, just upload it in ManualsLib which can be helpful for others.

<hr>

#### Follow @codingdefined

<hr>

node.title: Don't Want to Get Spam Emails - Use Mailinator Instead
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
These days you need your email address in almost all the website for the sign-up purpose. 

​Now you never know the personal email ids which you share in these websites are shared or not with others. Some share the email ids or some might sell it, if they do it then you might get tons of spam emails.

​This is where Mailinator comes into picture. Millinator is a free service which gives you an email address instantly and that email address will be destroyed after few hours.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcCc43nsgNRfo5UjMgtvyxDo8Do5B4FzU1gynkduAp4vp/image.png)
PC : https://www.mailinator.com/

One more thing is that you can create as many as email address and just stop worrying about the spam emails. 

FAQ from their Website

### >What is Mailinator?

>The Public Mailinator site is a different kind of email service. The biggest difference is that you don't need to sign up. Any email name you can think of already exists @mailinator.com and you can use any of them. Want BrianTheSkink@mailinator.com? You got it. Want PrettyMothra? ScaryGavyn? No problem. Those and any other mailboxes you think of @mailinator.com are created when email arrives! Really. Other differences of the Public Mailinator system include:

>All Emails automatically delete after a few hours
>You cannot SEND from Mailinator - it is a receive-only service
>All email is public. Really - very very public. All Email is readable by anyone and no one "owns" an inbox or emails.

I think it is very good in terms of reducing the Spam Emails in your personal email addresses

node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
This is my second entry for the B&W photo contest initiated by @daveks and sponsored by @papa-pepper.

### Lake Pichola in Udaipur, India

Udaipur is one of the most romantic cities in the World and not only in India because of its natural attractions and a huge number of places to visit. One such place is Lake Pichola. You will also see a number of Man-made island in this lake.
